main.name: HENRY JEAN LOGIQUE
main.description: I'm a Web/Multimedia Developer & E-Learning Application Programmer from Maryland, USA. I aim to make a difference through my technical and artistic creativity, and by providing solutions
main.bio: I am a Web/Multimedia Developer & E-Learning Application Programmer, working as a contractor. My work experience is in web development, application programming, multimedia, graphic design and software quality assurance. My academic backgrounds are Master of Art in Visual Effects, Master of Science in Biomedical Engineering, bachelor of science in Physics, and associate degree in Machine Design. I have certificates in Web Design and application Programming, and studied Game programming for two semesters. I am currently studying Full Stack Web Development at GW Code Boot Camp. My interests include Web technologies, 3d graphics programming, Virtual and Augmented Reality, Simulation and Artificial Intelligence. I am always eager to learn new technologies and finding solutions.

projects.title: React Google Books Search
projects.category: 'This React app allows users search for books and view them in a list. Users can save books to a list, to review or purchase later.

projects.title: React Employee Directory
projects.category: This React app allows users to view the entire employee directory at once to have quick access to employee's non-sensitive information.

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracking App - Group Project
projects.category: This application allows members to access updated statistics about the COVID-19 virus in their states as well as other states.

projects.title: Software Engineering Team Generator
projects.category: This Node CLI application generates a nicely formatted team roster based on the information provided by the user.

projects.title: Valshop - Group Project
projects.category: This application displays features and prices of different product types from different resources in one location. It also displays the weather condtion.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard - Server-Side APIs
projects.category: This application displays the current weather information and the weather forecast for the next five days for any city in the world.

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler - Third-Party API
projects.category: This is a simple daily planner application which saves users' daily schedules between 7AM and 7PM.
